name: CP Plus CP-UNC-2201 HD Bullet Camera
description: The CP Plus CP-UNC-2201 is an HD bullet camera offering 1080p resolution, night vision up to 30 meters, and motion detection. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor use.

review.comment: High-quality camera with good night vision and solid build.

customerReviews.name: Michael Green
customerReviews.comment: Excellent camera with clear video and effective night vision.

customerReviews.name: Jessica Turner
customerReviews.comment: Good camera but installation instructions were unclear.

name: CP Plus CP-PAR-2204 PTZ Camera
description: The CP Plus CP-PAR-2204 is a PTZ camera with 4x optical zoom and 720p resolution. It offers remote pan, tilt, and zoom control, night vision up to 50 meters, and advanced motion detection.

review.comment: Versatile PTZ camera with excellent zoom capabilities and night vision.

customerReviews.name: David Brown
customerReviews.comment: Amazing camera with great zoom and control features.

customerReviews.name: Emily Lewis
customerReviews.comment: Effective PTZ camera but the setup took longer than expected.
